General.Name: Thinkingdom Media Group Ltd
General.Description: Thinkingdom Media Group Ltd. engages in the planning, publication, and distribution of books and e-books in China. The company offers Chinese literature and children's books. It is also involved in the film and television planning; and books retail activities. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Huang  Ningqun
1.Title: Vice GM & GM of Content Center and Director

2.Name: Mr. Zhu  Guoliang
2.Title: Vice GM, GM of Production & Sales Center and Director
